title.uz: Dasturiy ta'minot muhandisi | Mobil ilovalar ishlab chiqish

introduction.en: I'm a Mobile Software Engineer with about five year of experience in Mobile App Development. Building innovative Android and iOS apps with architecture design for easy upgrades and bug fixes.
introduction.uz: Men Mobile App Development sohasida taxminan besh yillik tajribaga ega Mobile Software Engineerman. Android va iOS uchun oson yangilanish va xatolarni tuzatish uchun arxitektura dizayni bilan innovatsion ilovalar yarataman.

description.uz: Flutter bilan iOS va Android uchun ilovalarni professional darajada ishlab chiqish.
